alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 7:10PM CDT until May 14 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN SANGAMON COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Oak, or 10 miles east of Virden, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 7:04 PM, the public reported quarter size hail one mile east of White Oak. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morrisonville and Palmer. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
